1915: The Insurance provided by Sections 1, 2 and 5 is extended by this Section to include any loss directly caused by an Act of Terrorism occurring during the Period of Insurance at the Premises but only in England Wales and Scotland but not the territorial seas adjacent thereto as defined by the Territorial Sea Act 1987 nor the Isle of Man nor the Channel Islands, subject to all the terms, Exceptions and Conditions of this Policy.
